name: fhaMAZEin
description:
Take control of 5 units with unique gameplay and powers, and find your way out of this infinite maze ! Will you escape the infinite maze :
  • By climbing on the walls and on the ceiling ?
  • By destroying everything standing in your way ?
  • By looking at the path out ?
  • By chaotically spasming around ?
  • By flying ?

No matter what you do, the clock is ticking, and you must be fast and decisive. Or you can lay back at the minimal difficulty. The game has a large array of options for you to fiddle with:
  • How big do you want the maze modules to be ?
  • Should the maze entirely reconfigure once in a while ?
  • What kind of distortion lens do you want applied to the game ?
  • How many gate types, and how frequently do they appear ?
  • How often do you encounter new team members or new NPCs ?
  • Adjust difficulty individually on morale costs and power costs
  • Keep in mind that higher difficulty yields higher scores ! Are you going to be the best fhaMAZEin player to ever live ? Only one way to find out !

fhaMAZEin ! The game for winners ! The game with the strong and voluptuous musk of alpha-masculinity ! PURCHASE RIGHT NOW !!!
